official_title: Improving Health-Promoting Behaviors in Adolescent Cancer Survivors Using AWAKE: A Feasibility Trial
inclusion_criteria:
Adolescent survivors:

* Early survivor: 3 months to 2 years after therapy completion
* Long-term survivor: â‰¥2 years after therapy completion
* 13-17 years of age
* Access to tablet or smartphone and internet

One designated guardian per survivor
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 13 Years
Must have maximum age of 17 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Cognitive delay that would preclude participation
* Participant or designated guardian unable to read English
* Active disease relapse
